text: Can we use Zygote.@adjoint to define custom adjoint rules for ReverseDiff? If not is there another possibility?

elements.text: Can we use Zygote.@adjoint to define custom adjoint rules for ReverseDiff? If not is there another possibility?

text: Check out ChainRules.jl this is the universal package for making forward and backward rules
